title: Spa Foods - The Pool
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Thai, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All soy protein substitutes used in the menu are non GMO, non MSG and preservative-free, without eggs in the ingredients. Has free Wi-Fi. Previously all veg, please confirm if the vegan options are good enough to keep this listing on HappyCow.
